text: every time i have the chance to book a
long layover

to save money on airplane tickets
break up your long travel days and best
of all have the ability to explore a new
city the last five long layovers i've
had were in hong kong
barcelona istanbul dubai and bali and in
each city
i challenged myself to see how much fun
i could have with exactly a hundred
dollars in 24 hours
it started off as a fun game and has
evolved into one of the most popular
series i've ever done

in the order that happened
